name: Judan Beast Fantasy Demo
description: Welcome To The Judan World, Where Magic And Life Interact With Each Other In Peace... One Fateful Day, The Dragon King And His Minions Started Wreaking Havoc On The World, Causing The World To Be Unstable, Leaving Our Hero, Ichigo Kitsuku, To Have To Fight The Dragon King's Forces And Save The World Of Judan From Eternal Darkness! But Will The Bad Guys Let Him Do It?
